name: The River (itch) (bymyselfstudio)
description:
It's a  tiny game about steering a kayak which actually was created for learning purposes and to be honest - I learned a lot. Since I know that every project should be a so called minimum viable product, I decided to publish this game. 

This game is no WIP, but maybe in future I'll refactor the code and implement more features.

Any feedback is not appreciated, since I just did the project for learning purposes and won't probably fix any issues, but if you though want to say something about it, just feel free to do so ;)
